Voting.title: Given the following prompt, which image do you like the most?

About.title: About Me
About.name: Wilmer Leon
About.bio: I am a passionate software engineer and AI enthusiast dedicated to exploring the frontiers of generative technology. Through my writing and projects, I aim to demystify complex AI concepts and build tools that empower others to create. Join me on this journey as we discover what's possible at the intersection of human creativity and artificial intelligence.
